message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $90 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand that $90 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $82. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $82 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand that $82 was a bit too high, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $75. I can offer it to you for $80.50. It's a compromise that I think you'll find reasonable.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $80.50 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $78. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far away from my original offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, though. I can offer it to you for $81. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $81 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $79. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $80.50. It's my minimum price, and I think it's a fair deal considering the product's value. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time, though. I can offer it to you for $80.75. It's a compromise, and I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $80.75 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $78.50. It's my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.
